title: hextech chests upon getting S- ,S or S+
body: a few minutes ago i had just won a game as Darius ( which i own ) and got an S- or S dont quite remember ! and it was the first time i get that grade with said champion ! also i had all four chests available but still didnt get a chest after the game ! i have 8 keys and 2 fragments and got so many S's in the past few months but not a single chest ! this really makes me lose motivation and feel like not playing anymore .

replies.body:
Which account did you have this issue on? I can't find anything on this one. If you can provide the *summoner name* for the account you experienced this on, I can take a look.

Note that you can only earn 1 chest per champion each season. If someone in your premade earns an S-rating while you're on a champ, it does count towards that champion's chest eligibility for that season.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
